generic.password-requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain one number, one uppercase letter, and one special character

release-form.amount-greater-than-zero: The value must be greater than zero

release-form.date-must-remain-the-same: To change other releases along with this, the date must remain the same

confirm-duplicated-releases.title: This release repeats on other dates

my-accounts.title: My Accounts
my-accounts.minus-for-negative-more-for-positive: Type - for negative balance and + for positive
my-accounts.primary-account-tooltip: Select a primary account if this is a sub-account. This allows linking this account as a 'box', 'piggy bank' or investment account of the selected primary account, facilitating organization and financial control.

credit-cards.limit-must-be-greater-than-zero: Limit must be greater than zero

my-profile.title: My Profile

cancel-account-dialog.title: Account Cancellation
cancel-account-dialog.description: You are about to cancel your account. This action is irreversible and will result in the permanent deletion of all your data from our system. A confirmation email will be sent to you. Please confirm the cancellation by clicking on the link provided in the email.
cancel-account-dialog.error-sending-email: An error occurred while sending the email. Please try again later or contact us

change-password-dialog.title: Password Change
change-password-dialog.cannot-be-the-same-as-current: The new password cannot be the same as the current password
change-password-dialog.unexpected-error-updating-password: There was an unexpected error updating the password

cancelation-error.title: Error Canceling Account
cancelation-error.sub-title: An error occurred while trying to cancel your account. This may have happened for one of the following reasons:
cancelation-error.reason-1: The confirmation link has expired (valid for only 2 hours)
cancelation-error.reason-2: The link has already been used
cancelation-error.try-again-later: Please try again later or contact our support for assistance.
